content: this legal text summarizes a court case where ra was granted the right to live in a dwelling and a shed with a heating plant the court determined the value of various properties and lands and divided them into three lots taking into account ras right of habitation the court allocated the lots accordingly the court also discussed the right of assignment and the drawing of lots ultimately the court ordered the division of the properties and lands among the parties involved the text also mentions that judge dr chiara dalfonso made the final ruling granting ra the right to live in a dwelling located in municipality castelfrentano the judge calculated the value of different parts of the property and assigned certain portions to the municipality castel frentano the judge excluded the right to adjust the property for the allottee of lot 3 due to their express waiver adp was allocated a 13 share of the property and the trial costs will be fully compensated with each party responsible for 50 of the expenses the ruling was made on june 20 2021
